SPOM.content: [Kojève] “practically,” the “grotesque signature of this sententious verdict”
SPOM.linkedContent: [Kojève] “practically,” the “grotesque signature of this sententious verdict”

POOF.content: via Plato, no prâxis can correspond to indications contained in a léxis ——since politics is essentially a prâxis, no politics can be adequate to purity of Schmitt’s concept re: enemy > politics as that which situates very place of a concept’s inadequation to itself [?]
POOF.linkedContent: via Plato, no prâxis can correspond to indications contained in a léxis ——since politics is essentially a prâxis, no politics can be adequate to purity of Schmitt’s concept re: enemy > politics as that which situates very place of a concept’s inadequation to itself [?]

GSP.content: Telos/Vorhaben > infinite theoretical anticipation & infinite practical task: Kantian Idea as project of phenom.? makes it possible by overflowing its system (as its end?) > doesn’t enclose genesis of Being & meaning—is structurally genesis itself: origin/becoming, birth of history
GSP.linkedContent: Telos/Vorhaben > infinite theoretical anticipation & infinite practical task: Kantian Idea as project of phenom.? makes it possible by overflowing its system (as its end?) > doesn’t enclose genesis of Being & meaning—is structurally genesis itself: origin/becoming, birth of history

O.content: dissemination: generalizes theory/practice of graft w/out proper body, skew w/out straight line [?], bias w/out front [Nietzsche perspectivism?]
O.linkedContent: dissemination: generalizes theory/practice of graft w/out proper body, skew w/out straight line [?], bias w/out front [Nietzsche perspectivism?]

Gii.content: [Heidegger’s rethinking of praxis/theoria in relation to hand]

in seminar on Parmenides, Heidegger translates pragma as Handlung, so pragmata present themselves as Zuhandenes, Vorhandenes, w/in reach of hand > only a man w/ speech & thus hands can pray, murder, greet, give thanks, make oaths, signal (Wink)
Gii.linkedContent: in seminar on Parmenides, Heidegger translates pragma as Handlung, so pragmata present themselves as Zuhandenes, Vorhandenes, w/in reach of hand > only a man w/ speech & thus hands can pray, murder, greet, give thanks, make oaths, signal (Wink)

DST.content: deconstruction (as/via [?] supplementary ring [anneau]) sometimes a task (tâche), sometimes an event (in a “practical” situation) > Lacoue-Labarthe says deconstruction’s a word “not in the least ‘worn out (usé)’” [cf. REST p. 277 ring linked to Van Gogh’s trap?]

AFR.content: in Condillac, primacy of practical instinct invariable trait of new critical metaphysics: not philosophy of praxis but metaphysics of fact > general theory, de facto & de jure, presupposes scientific fact
AFR.linkedContent: in Condillac, primacy of practical instinct invariable trait of new critical metaphysics: not philosophy of praxis but metaphysics of fact > general theory, de facto & de jure, presupposes scientific fact

AFR.content: for Condillac, metaphysics, psychology, outside of usage, good use; Condillac: “I would call it psychology, if I knew any good work under this title”
AFR.linkedContent: for Condillac, metaphysics, psychology, outside of usage, good use; Condillac: “I would call it psychology, if I knew any good work under this title”

AFR.content: for Condillac, theoretical knowledge can be remarked, noted, signed, thus he is critical of all unconscious perception (practical knowledge) > remarking remarked against unconsciousness in general [Condillac’s critique of Leibniz, who Condillac knew insufficiently]
AFR.linkedContent: for Condillac, theoretical knowledge can be remarked, noted, signed, thus he is critical of all unconscious perception (practical knowledge) > remarking remarked against unconsciousness in general [Condillac’s critique of Leibniz, who Condillac knew insufficiently]

AFR.content: acc. Condillac, theoretical is only a supplying remark (remarque suppléante) of the practical
AFR.linkedContent: acc. Condillac, theoretical is only a supplying remark (remarque suppléante) of the practical

D.content: re: Soller’s Numbers, a praxis that doesn’t just produce (not governed by motif of truth whose very horizon it frames), a certain textual zero

CF.content: theoretical/critical reflection indissociable from practical initiations
